str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.
And not, not even, neither?nor. From me and de; but not, not even; in a continued negation, nor.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
